item.title: Baltic states making historic switch away from Russian power grid
item.description: More than 30 years after leaving the Soviet Union, Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania will join the EU's grid.

item.title: Modi's BJP ahead in tightly-fought Delhi election race
item.description: Early trends show Modi's party is ahead of the incumbent Aam Aadmi Party as votes are counted in India's capital.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump plan to put thousands of USAID staff on leave
item.description: A last-minute lawsuit means Trump's efforts to dismantle the overseas aid agency have been put on hold.

item.title: Trump says he is revoking Biden's security clearance
item.description: "There is no need for Joe Biden to continue receiving access to classified information," President Donald Trump says.

item.title: 16 things Trump and his team did this week
item.description: In his third week back in office, Trump took action on issues from transgender competitors in women's sports to Gaza.
